backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the Game Vault backend with state and CRUD operations for products, categories, orders, and user profiles, plus authorization via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their IDs, titles, affected files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels â€” primarily covering sunset theme replacement across CSS, Tailwind config, and frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing each component's purpose, props, and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark modes via CSS custom properties, with minimal base layer rules applying border and background/foreground defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Game Vault React app with the `dark` class set on `<html>` and inline critical CSS to prevent white flash before React hydrates.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing hash-based client-side routing, cart state management, authentication checks, profile setup modal, and rendering of all page components wrapped in QueryClient and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-screen access denied UI component displaying a shield icon, error message, and a back-to-store link, styled with OKLCH color values for admin-restricted routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminWhite: An admin UI component for managing the admin username whitelist, supporting adding and removing usernames with confirmation dialogs and React Query cache updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryFo: A form component for creating or editing a product category, using add/update mutation hooks and rendering name and description fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: An admin panel component that lists all product categories in a table and provides dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting categories using query and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: An admin component that displays all orders in a table, showing buyer details, product info fetched per-row, payment method, and order status badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: A form component for creating or editing a product listing, with fields for game name, category, title, description, account details, price, and availability, using add/update mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin UI component that displays a table of all products with options to add, edit, and delete them using dialogs and the ProductForm component.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessContr: A guard component that restricts access to admin content by verifying Internet Identity authentication, user profile existence, and admin status, showing appropriate loading/error states at each step.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: A slide-in drawer component displaying cart items with remove functionality, a running total, and a checkout button, toggled via an overlay.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: A styled button component representing a product category that highlights when selected and calls a callback on click.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CryptoP: Checkout payment component for cryptocurrency (BTC/ETH) that displays a mock wallet address, copy button, QR placeholder, and a confirmation checkbox before submitting the order.
frontend/src/components/checkout/GiftCar: Checkout payment component that accepts a UK gift card code, validates it with a mock async check, and enables order confirmation only on successful validation.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayIn3P: Checkout payment component that splits the total into three monthly installments, displays a payment schedule, and requires user agreement before confirming the order.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Payment: UI component that renders a grid of selectable payment method cards (PayPal, Crypto, Gift Card, Pay in 3) and highlights the currently selected option.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayPalP: Checkout payment component that simulates a PayPal redirect flow, showing a mock authorisation confirmation step before the user finalises the order.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer displaying the Game Vault brand, store navigation links, accepted payment methods, and a copyright bar with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: A no-op stub component kept for compatibility; actual layout is handled directly in App.tsx.
A Three.js-powered animated loading screen that renders a cyberpunk city drive scene with a progress bar, then fades out and calls an onComplete callback.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with logo, store/admin page links, a cart icon with item count badge, and an Internet Identity login/logout button with mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A card component displaying a product's category, game name, title, description, and price, with an add-to-cart button and a click handler to view details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal component that prompts new users to choose a username, with debounced availability checking and form submission to create the username via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initialising admin access control when a token is present, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Defines a React context and provider for shopping cart state, exposing add, remove, and clear item operations along with computed totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login status, identity persistence, and session lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, usernames, categories, products, and orders using a shared actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a dark sunset-themed design system with CSS custom properties, Tailwind layers, custom fonts (Orbitron/Rajdhani), and utility classes for glow effects and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/models/Vehicle.tsx: Defines Three.js 3D vehicle components (sports car, motorcycle, realistic car) with geometry and materials, animated along lanes using react-three-fiber.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page with tabbed navigation for managing categories, products, orders, and admin whitelist, wrapped in an access control guard component.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Multi-step checkout page (review, contact, payment method, payment details) that collects user info, renders the appropriate payment component, and submits an order via the usePlaceOrder hook.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a success screen after order placement, fetching and showing order details (product, payment method, status) by order ID with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows full details for a single product including description, pricing, availability, and an Add to Cart button, with a back-navigation control.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Main storefront page with a hero section, search input, and a filtered product grid loaded from the backend, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a sunset/dusk color palette, Orbitron and Rajdhani font families, custom box shadows, glow animations, and plugin registrations.
project_state.json: Tracks the full project state (version 21) for 'Game Vault', a Shopify-style gaming accounts e-commerce store on ICP with Three.js loading screen, Internet Identity auth, username system, admin panel, and multiple payment flows. Documents existing features, known issues, and architectural notes.
